description:
The perfect tool for long nail-ups on aid climbs. The durable chromoly head has good heft and a large face for driving pitons home. The pick tapers to help lever out pitons, clean cracks, and paste mashies and bashies.

  • Hot-forged chromoly steel with chrome plating resists rust
  • Vibration-dampening rubber handle helps reduce hand fatigue
  • Carabiner hole for racking and pulling pins
  • Elastic rewind leash keeps hammer close at hand
name: Camp Brenta Piton Hammer With Leash
